A password reset request for account '{{ account_id }}' has been received and your email address is associated with that account in DOAJ.

Please visit {{ reset_url }} and choose a new password. Note that this link will expire after 24 hours. (If it has expired, you should start the process again: https://doaj.org/account/forgot )

If you did not request a new password, you can simply ignore this email.

Regards,
The DOAJ Editorial Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.
